title: the alpha client
body:
The Alpha Client 
every now and then when I'm just chilling on the home screen all of the "clickables"(eg; Home, Profile, Collection, etc) just disappear
Another thing that happens is when i look in my friends list it will say that someone is in a game, but then when i hover my mouse over their profile it'll say that they're offline.
idk if this is only happening to me, or if this has been covered already but i thought id just ask

replies.body: They are bugs which are being worked on.
